99995.「イエーイ！ そこの若者！\n バリバリ バトってる～？\n<yesno><br: Yaay! Hey, youngster! Havin' a good time?<yesno><break>

100131.「ほう！ <%sM_Badge>バッジを選ぶとは\n おぬしも なかなか わかっ:
Wow! You really know your stuff when it
comes to choosing a badge... So, shall we

101654.「うむっ 結構！ ワシは バトルロードを\n こよなく愛し 出場者を支援する……:
Mmm, fine! I love the Battle Roads and I support the contestants. Or as I like to call myself, Grandpa Badge. Hmm? I don't know
where I've seen you before. I'm sorry? It's just my imagination. It's not like he's sneaking around with the Minister to avoid
detection! That's not the point! You've got a badge of honor from the Battle Roads, don't you? I love Battle Roads so much that I'm
giving away some of my most prized badges to young, upcoming contestants. But... Not for free! I'll trade you your spare badges. If
you'd like to trade badges with me, just give me a call...

101655.「むむっ！？ なんじゃ おぬし\n まだ バトルロードに参加しておらんな？\n:
Hmph! What, you haven't joined the Battle
Road yet? My eyes cannot be deceived!

102848.「むむ！ どうやら それ以上\n 同じバッジは 持てないようじゃ。\n<bw_b:
Mmm! Apparently, I can't have the same badge
any more...<bw_break>

102850.「むむ！ おぬし まだバッジを１つも\n 手に入れてないようじゃな。\n 手に入:
Mmm! You haven't picked up a single badge
yet. I suggest you come back when you have
one.

103751.「ほう！ このバッジを選ぶとは\n おぬしも なかなか わかっているな……！\n:
Wow! You really know your stuff when it comes
to choosing this badge... So, shall we make
the exchange?<yesno><break>

103752.「このバッジを <%dM_BadgeNum>個じゃと！\n ぐぬぬ……これを選ぶ:
He wants <%dM_BadgeNum> of these badges! Oh
no... I'm impressed you chose this one! So, I

currently equipped to a monster. Are

302712.「むむ？ そのバッジは\n もう持っておるみたいじゃぞ？: Mmm? Don't you already have that badge?

Are you sure you want to exchange it?
